# device

**Instance Property**

The device for which the coordinator configures the preview layer.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var device: AVCaptureDevice? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice] instance you provided when instantiating the configurator. [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureExternalDisplayConfigurator] holds a weak reference to the device. If the device is released, this property returns `nil`.

## Inspecting the configurator

- **activeExternalDisplayFrameRate**: The currently configured frame rate on the external display that’s displaying the preview layer.
- **isActive**: This property tells you whether the configurator is actively configuring the external display.
- **previewLayer**: The layer for which the configurator adjusts display properties to match the device’s state.
